name: Silver Sword
description: A finely crafted sword made from pure silver.
looks: The Silver Sword has a shining silver blade with intricate engravings and a hilt made from polished wood. It emits a faint silver glow.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy sword made of steel
looks: The steel sword has a straight blade with a sharp point and a double-edged design. The hilt is made of leather wrapped around the handle, providing a comfortable grip. The pommel is adorned with a small gemstone.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Allows the use of advanced sword techniques.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword, perfect for cutting through enemies.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a double-edged design. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Sword of the Fallen
description: A powerful sword infused with the souls of fallen warriors.
looks: The Sword of the Fallen has a dark, ominous appearance with a black hilt and blade. The hilt is adorned with intricate engravings depicting scenes of battles. The blade emits a faint blue aura, giving it an otherworldly feel.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when equipped.

special_effects.soul_drain: Absorbs a small amount of the enemy's lifeforce with each attack, healing the wielder.

name: Bow of the Wind
description: A finely crafted bow that harnesses the power of the wind to deliver deadly accurate shots.
looks: The Bow of the Wind is made of polished wood with elegant carvings along the limbs. The grip is wrapped in supple leather for a comfortable grip. When drawn, the bow emits a soft breeze and leaves a trail of faint green sparks.

special_weapon_skils.archery: Grants a bonus to Archery skill when equipped.

special_effects.wind_blast: Unleashes a gust of wind with each shot, knocking back enemies.

name: Staff of the Magi
description: A mystical staff imbued with ancient arcane power.
looks: The Staff of the Magi is a tall staff made of polished ebony wood. It is adorned with intricate silver engravings that depict symbols of magic. At the top of the staff, a glowing crystal floats, pulsating with magical energy.

special_weapon_skils.spellcasting: Grants a bonus to Spellcasting skill when equipped.

special_effects.arcane_burst: Unleashes a powerful burst of arcane energy, damaging all enemies in an area of effect.

name: Warhammer of Thunder
description: A massive warhammer that crackles with electricity, capable of sending shockwaves through the enemies.
looks: The Warhammer of Thunder is a heavy, blunt weapon made from enchanted steel. The head of the hammer is adorned with lightning bolt motifs and crackles with electric energy. It has a long handle made of a sturdy wood, allowing for powerful swings.

special_weapon_skils.hammer_mastery: Grants a bonus to Hammer Mastery skill when equipped.

special_effects.thunderous_strike: Delivers a powerful shockwave upon impact, stunning enemies.

name: Amulet of Life
description: An enchanted amulet that radiates healing energy.
looks: The Amulet of Life is made of a golden chain with a pendant in the shape of a swirling sun. The pendant is encrusted with small emeralds that emit a soft green glow. When worn, the amulet emits a gentle warmth and a faint humming sound.

special_effects.healing_aura: Provides a passive healing aura that slowly regenerates nearby allies' health.

name: Ring of Shadows
description: A mysterious ring that grants the wearer enhanced stealth and invisibility abilities.
looks: The Ring of Shadows is made of a dark, smooth metal with a large, black gemstone at the center. When worn, the ring emits a soft, swirling mist that wraps around the wearer's hand.

special_effects.invisibility: Grants the ability to become invisible for a short period of time.

name: Elixir of Strength
description: A powerful elixir that temporarily enhances the user's strength.
looks: The Elixir of Strength is contained in a small, glass vial with a metallic cap. The liquid inside the vial is a vibrant red color, swirling with energy. When consumed, the elixir emits a burst of energy and a faint spicy aroma.

special_effects.strength_boost: Temporarily increases the user's strength stat, providing a bonus to damage dealt.

name: Potion of Healing
description: A healing potion that instantly restores the user's health.
looks: The Potion of Healing is contained in a small, glass vial with a cork stopper. The liquid inside the vial is a vibrant blue color, shimmering with energy. When consumed, the potion emits a soothing glow and a faint floral scent.

special_effects.healing: Instantly restores a portion of the user's health.

name: Scroll of Fireball
description: A magical scroll that allows the user to cast a powerful fireball spell.
looks: The Scroll of Fireball is made of aged parchment, with intricate arcane symbols and sigils written in golden ink. When held, the scroll emits a faint warmth and a soft crackling sound. When activated, the scroll bursts into flames and is consumed in a flash of fire.

special_effects.fireball: Allows the user to cast a powerful fireball spell, dealing fire damage to enemies in a small area.

name: Sunfire Sword
description: A powerful sword infused with the essence of the sun. It radiates a warm light and can unleash fiery attacks.
looks: The Sunfire Sword has a golden hilt with intricate patterns resembling flames. The blade is made of pure crystal and emits a soft, warm glow.

special_effects.fire_affinity: Increases fire damage dealt by the wielder.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Shadowstrike Dagger
description: A deadly dagger imbued with shadow magic, capable of striking with incredible precision and delivering devastating blows.
looks: The Shadowstrike Dagger has a sleek black blade made of obsidian, with intricate engravings that seem to shimmer with darkness. The hilt is wrapped in black leather and adorned with a small shadow gem.

special_weapon_skils.assassination: Increases critical strike chance and damage when using this weapon.

special_effects.shadow_strike: Has a chance to deal bonus shadow damage on hit.

name: Health Potion
description: A small flask containing a magical red liquid that restores health when consumed.
looks: The health potion is contained in a small glass flask with a cork stopper. The liquid inside is a vibrant red color.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.
